TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract ShaderEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect
Public MustInherit Class ShaderEffect Inherits Effect
public ref class ShaderEffect abstract : System::Windows::Media::Effects::Effect

summary.span: Provides a custom bitmap effect by using a .

span.span: Provides a custom bitmap effect by using a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自类，以实现自定义效果基于单个像素着色器。Derive from the class to implement a custom effect based on a single pixel shader. 以下步骤演示如何创建自定义效果。The following steps show how to create a custom effect. 1. 负载从预编译的高级别明暗度语言 (HLSL) 字节码。Load a from precompiled High Level Shading Language (HLSL) bytecode. 2. 定义表示的参数的效果的依赖项属性与-基于图面输入。Define dependency properties that represent the parameters of the effect and the -based surface inputs. 使用之一重载关联这些输入与在 HLSL 字节码中注册引用的数字。Use one of the overloads to associate these inputs with register numbers that are referenced in the HLSL bytecode. 取样器数被限制为 4。The number of samplers is limited to 4. 使用 PS 3.0 着色器时，将应用以下限制。The following restrictions apply when using a PS 3.0 shader. - PS 3.0 着色器分配时，取样器数增加至 8。When a PS 3.0 shader is assigned, the number of samplers increases to 8. 将分配其他着色器以启用注册 8 个取样器之前的 PS 3.0 着色器。Assign the PS 3.0 shader before other shaders to enable registering 8 samplers. - 则使用为 224 对于浮点型值的完整着色器常量寄存器限制。The full shader constant register limit of 224 for floats is used. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ps_3_0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166292)。For more information, see [ps_3_0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166292). - PS 3.0 着色器仅支持以下数据类型。The following data types are supported in PS 3.0 shaders only. 如果这些在较低的着色器版本中使用，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if these are used in lower shader versions. - `int` 和类型转换为`int`: `uint`， `byte`， `sbyte`， `long`， `ulong`， `short`， `ushort`， `char``int` and types convertible to `int`: `uint`, `byte`, `sbyte`, `long`, `ulong`, `short`, `ushort`, `char` - `bool` - 如果没有为 PS 3.0 支持的硬件的计算机上加载有效的 PS 3.0 着色器，则忽略着色器。If a valid PS 3.0 shader is loaded on a computer that does not have hardware support for PS 3.0, the shader is ignored. 如果着色器无效，不引发异常。If the shader is invalid, no exception is thrown. - 如果计算机具有多个视频卡，由至少支持的视频卡定义行为。If a computer has more than one video card, the behavior is defined by the least capable video card. 例如，如果计算机上有两个视频卡，其中一个支持 PS 3.0 且其中一个没有，则行为是相同就像计算机不支持 PS 3.0。For example, if the computer has two video cards, one of which supports PS 3.0 and one of which does not, the behavior is the same as if the computer does not support PS 3.0. - 如果计算机支持呈现 PS 3.0 中硬件，但为其分配的无效的 PS 3.0 着色器，引发事件。If a computer supports rendering PS 3.0 in hardware, but an invalid PS 3.0 shader is assigned, the event is raised. 无效的 PS 3.0 着色器的一个示例是一个使用编译`ps_3_sw`标志。An example of an invalid PS 3.0 shader is one compiled with the `ps_3_sw` flag. 类接受仅 PS 3.0 着色器使用编译`ps_3_0`标志传递给 fxc.exe。The class accepts only PS 3.0 shaders that are compiled with the `ps_3_0` flag passed to fxc.exe. 有关详细信息，请参阅[效果编译器工具](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166293)。For more information, see [Effect-Compiler Tool](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=166293). > [!NOTE] > PS 2.0 着色器运行在软件中呈现时。PS 2.0 shaders run when rendering in software. 但是，如果即使系统的硬件支持 PS 3.0，则 PS 3.0 着色器不能运行在软件呈现过程。However, even if PS 3.0 is supported by the system's hardware, PS 3.0 shaders do not run during software rendering. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类。The following code example shows how to derive from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect/CS/ThresholdEffect.cs#1)] 下面的代码示例演示与上一个对应的着色器类。The following code example shows a shader that corresponds to the previous class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect/CS/Threshold.fx#10)] 下面的 XAML 演示如何使用自定义的着色器效果。The following XAML shows how to use the custom shader effect. [!code-xaml[System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect#1000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect/CS/Window1.xaml#1000)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property int DdxUvDdyUvRegisterIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the shader register to use for the partial derivatives of the texture coordinates with respect to screen space.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the shader register to use for the partial derivatives of the texture coordinates with respect to screen space.

value.span: 包含偏导数的寄存器的索引。

span.span: The index of the register that contains the partial derivatives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的着色器寄存器，包含偏导数的纹理坐标对屏幕空间。Use the property to specify the shader register that contains the partial derivatives of the texture coordinates with respect to screen space. 例如，如果设置为 4，使用着色器寄存器 c4。For example, if is set to 4, the shader register c4 is used. 寄存器 c4 包含四个浮点字段。Register c4 contains four float fields. 下面的高级别明暗度语言 (HLSL) 代码演示如何使用此注册。The following High Level Shading Language (HLSL) code shows how this register is used. `nextPixelUV`值向右表示下一个像素。The `nextPixelUV` value represents the next pixel to the right. ``` float4 ddxUvDdyUv : register(c4); SamplerState sampler : register(S0); ... float2 nextPixelUV; nextPixelUV.u = ddxUvDdyUv.x + u; nextPixelUV.v = ddxUvDdyUv.y + v; tex2D(sampler, nextPixelUV); ``` 下表显示如何注册为指定填充。The following table shows how the register specified for is filled. |注册常量Register Constant|派生的值Derivative Value| |-----------------------|----------------------| |x 组件x component|ddx(u)ddx(u)| |y 组件y component|ddx(v)ddx(v)| |z 分量z component|ddy(u)ddy(u)| |w 分量w component|ddy(v)ddy(v)| 纹理坐标被表示为`(u, v)`。Texture coordinates are denoted as `(u, v)`. `ddx(u)` 是纹理坐标组件的常量偏导数`u`对屏幕空间 x 坐标。`ddx(u)` is the constant partial derivative of the texture coordinate component `u` with respect to the screen-space x-coordinate. `ddy(u)` 是纹理坐标的偏导数`u`对屏幕空间 y 坐标。`ddy(u)` is the partial derivative of the texture coordinate `u` with respect to the screen-space y-coordinate. 同样，`ddx(v)`和`ddy(v)`是纹理坐标组件对应的屏幕空间衍生产品`v`。Similarly, `ddx(v)` and `ddy(v)` are the corresponding screen-space derivatives for the texture coordinate component `v`. > [!NOTE] > HLSL 具有的 ddx 和 ddy 的说明来计算这些值，但这些说明不在所有 PixelShader 2.0 硬件上可用。HLSL has the ddx and ddy instructions to calculate these values, but these instructions are not available on all PixelShader 2.0 hardware. 你可能按以下方式将这些常量。You may think of these constants in the following way. 如果你单步执行 1 个像素屏幕空间 （在 x 方向），在右侧然后`ddx(u)`是量，`u`纹理空间中的更改和`ddx(v)`是量，`v`纹理空间中的更改。If you step 1 pixel to the right in screen space (in the x direction), then `ddx(u)` is the amount that `u` changes in texture space, and `ddx(v)` is the amount that `v` changes in texture space. 如果效果为轴对齐呈现时，然后`ddx(v)`为 0。If the effect is axis-aligned when it is rendered, then `ddx(v)` is 0. 如果效果为旋转呈现时，然后`ddx(v)`为非零。If the effect is rotated when it is rendered, then `ddx(v)` is non-zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法注册为着色器常量依赖项属性时。Use the method when you register a dependency property for a shader constant. 方法构造委托，调用时，依赖项属性与指定的着色器常量寄存器之间创建关联`floatRegisterIndex`。The method constructs a delegate that, when invoked, creates an association between the dependency property and the shader constant register specified by `floatRegisterIndex`.
